item.title: UCSD - Luo Junzhe's multiple illegal behaviors exposed
item.author: 作者
item.description: Luo Junzhe's multiple illegal and unethical behaviors have been exposed, including stealing roommates' cash and credit cards, abusing cats, hiring prostitutes, freeloading, overcharging everyone, etc. He also set up his friend's online banking account to regularly transfer money to him, which is illegal and fraudulent to his friend. He also secretly used game cheats to deceive in games.
